content.question: Which of the following most directly contributed to the conflict referred to in the excerpt?

choices.label: Tensions between isolationism and international engagement
Disagreements over whether to allow slavery in new territories
Debates about the role of religion in society and government

content.answer: Disagreements over whether to allow slavery in new territories

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
